content:
This small sequence of PRs upgrades the current Euler's partition theorem by both generalizing it and use the infinite power series in the proof as desired in this TODO.

It has two leaf PRs ready for review: #30567 (general construction of generating function for Nat.Partition) and #30599 (geometric series of PowerSeries)

Hi @Bhavik Mehta, could you chime in in the discussion in #30618? I'd like to address comments, but the more I look/code the less sense it makes to me. Maybe there is something I haven't understand yet
@Bhavik Mehta Sorry for another ping... Got time to take a look?
Posting #33143 here as a follow up on partition-related theorems. It has sit there for a few weeks so I figured I should try getting more attention
